::Shredder::

Shredder turns his head as he hears Mantella's yell. He couldn't believe she 
was screaming her head off like that, in the middle of a forest, that might 
be Predacon territory. He grins as he walks through the bushes, coming out 
from a thick bush behind her.

"Feeling suicidal today? You're calling all the preds in the area to attack 
you, you know."
